WorkItem.ClosedComment: Closed as submitter reported issue was due to typo on their part
WorkItem.Summary: Error first time Running Application After Adding Entity Framework System.Data.Edm.EdmEntityType: : EntityType 'Album' has no key defined. Define the key for this EntityType.

Comments.Message: Nevermind I realized AlbumId was the wrong type. My bad.

where did you get the steps to add the database
I am getting runtime errors in step 4 on Genre not being an entity

I had the same problem, but mine was of a different cause.
I got the error trying to follow Chapter 4 of Professional asp.net mvc 4.

Previously, I had ran a NuGet on a package that previously installed a different Album Class
(that didn't have an id property).
It had also put it not in Models, but in Samples, after the book had stressed that models were always in the Models folder, I didn't think to look there.
Building the solution detected the error for me.

Solution:
I had to delete that other Album class before creating the StoreManagerController.
